response.original_title: Glowing Fireplace with Acoustic Christmas Music
response.overview: Enjoy 3 hours of Glowing Fireplace with Acoustic Christmas Music in this ambient fireplace film. Brilliant flames and glowing coals paired with calm and soft instrumental hymns create the perfect holiday ambiance.
response.tagline: Warm Up with the Ambiance of a Glowing Fireplace with Christmas Music
response.title: Glowing Fireplace with Acoustic Christmas Music
